name: CyberRunner (Ludum Dare 48)
description:
In this game you need to destroy cyber security bots as you delve deeper into cyberspace toward the megalithic golden pyramid. 

This project was made in 48 hours for the ludum dare 48 game jam in Unity 2019 and is incomplete but runs.

  • WASD - move up/left/down/right
  • Left click - fire
  • Right click - alternate fire
  • Escape - quit

Source code available below.
